Description: Limestone relief with Greek alphabetic inscription; below the inscription are carved in relief a pair of sea-horses ridden by cupids with an architectural ornament between. Traces of red colouring in the letters.
Curator's comments: From the same monument as 1926,0419.8 which has an identical inscription. For the relief, see Rumpf 1939, 116. For the inscription, Fraser and Rumpf 1952, B, and pl. XIV, below. Bibliography: Fraser, P.M. and Rumpf, A. 1952, 'Two Ptolemaic dedications', Journal of Egyptian Archaeology 38, 65-74. Rumpf, A. 1939, Die Meerwesen auf den Antiken Sarkophagenreliefs.
Exhibition history: 2022-23 23 Sep- 8 Jan, Brussels, BOZAR, Alexandria Tour PROPOSED 2023 8 Feb- 8 May, Marseilles, MUCEM, Alexandria Tour PROPOSED
